Topic.Title: Gamebook pages don't open a new page

Posts.EditableText:
Hi,

I'm a complete newb to this but I seem to have a fairly fundamental problem with the gamebook style game, when playing my game, clicking a link to a new page just appends the same page with the new page text. I expected a 'new page' to be a new page.

Is this correct behaviour?
Posts.HTML:
Hi,

I'm a complete newb to this but I seem to have a fairly fundamental problem with the gamebook style game, when playing my game, clicking a link to a new page just appends the same page with the new page text. I expected a 'new page' to be a new page.

Is this correct behaviour?

Posts.EditableText: Try checking the "Clear screen between each page" checkbox on the "Display" tab.
Posts.HTML: Try checking the "Clear screen between each page" checkbox on the "Display" tab.
